name: Late Packing
description:
This is a game focused on psychological horror and horror ambience, with a small seasoning of jumpscares. For the most part, the only light you have is the flashlight, which will be useful to find the objects you need to pack. The play time is about 5 to 10 minutes. Late Packing offers 3 different endings, going from easiest to hardest. 

If you completed all 3 of them, please let me know on the comments.    

Quick TIp: 

  • Optimize the game on Settings before playing it, either manual or automatic.
  • Headphones are highly recommended. 
If you enjoyed, please consider visiting my Patreon Page. Thank You! Release Date - IT'S OUT NOOOOW!!!
